com.netflix.genie.core.jpa.entities

Class JobRequestEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.core.jpa.entities.BaseEntity
      • com.netflix.genie.core.jpa.entities.CommonFieldsEntity
        • com.netflix.genie.core.jpa.entities.SetupFileEntity
          • com.netflix.genie.core.jpa.entities.JobRequestEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Entity
public class JobRequestEntity
extends SetupFileEntity
    Representation of the original Genie Job request.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
